q1.question: What Is DFS Chain (DSC)?
q1.answer: DFS Chain is a layer 0 blockchain based on the web2 system, unlike web3 blockchains. It is an up-to-date version of the blockchain that is made to be easy, smooth, and least expensive, even for first-time users, without the need to connect to complex wallets like Web3.

q2.question: What are the main features of DFS Chain (DSC)?
q2.answer: The system ensures the safety of your data and transactions and provides reliable monitoring to ensure that everything runs smoothly. Unlike Web3 tools, it can be easily integrated with the Web2 tools you are familiar with, resulting in faster transaction processing and lower costs.

q3.question: Does DFS Chain (DSC) have validators?
q3.answer: Unlike validator-based blockchains, DFS Chain operates without validators. However, our system focuses on optimized asset, user, and transaction management with high reliability and efficiency.

q4.question: How much does DFS Chain (DSC) cost?
q4.answer: We try to offer the lowest rates among the many chains. Per transaction, 0.001$~ It depends on the service content.

q5.question: What can we expect from the widespread adoption of DFS Chain (DSC)?
q5.answer: As a gateway for those who are frustrated with the Web3 system and for first-time users, it provides the concept and logic of Web3 chains, and DFS Chain and all web3 chains are connected, so you can create a large market volume.

hero.title: Token Staking
hero.subtitle: Create and participate in staking events for approved tokens. Set interest rates and let users stake their tokens to earn rewards.

howItWorks.title: How Token Staking Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process for token creators and stakers

publishToken.title: Publish Token
publishToken.description: Publish your token in WhiteCreator platform to enable staking functionality.

adminApproval.title: Admin Approval
adminApproval.description: Only admin-approved tokens can be used for staking events.

setStaking.title: Set Staking Event
setStaking.description: Configure interest rate and open staking event in WhiteCreator.

participate.title: Users Participate
participate.description: Users can stake tokens in the dedicated staking project (coming soon).

step1.title: 1. Publish Your Token in WhiteCreator
step1.description: To enable staking for your token, you first need to publish it using the WhiteCreator platform. WhiteCreator is DFS Chain's token publishing platform where you can create and deploy your DRC20 tokens with an approval system.
step1.description2: Once your token is published, it will go through the community-driven approval process. This ensures quality and security for all tokens on the platform.

step2.title: 2. Admin Approval Required
step2.description: Only tokens that have been approved by the admin can be used for staking. This approval process ensures that only legitimate, verified tokens can create staking events, protecting users from potential scams or low-quality projects.
step2.description2: The admin reviews tokens based on various criteria including project legitimacy, token utility, and compliance with DFS Chain standards. Once approved, your token becomes eligible for staking functionality.

step3.title: 3. Set Interest Rate and Open Staking Event
step3.description: For approved tokens, token creators can set an interest rate and open a staking event directly within the WhiteCreator platform. This allows you to incentivize users to hold and stake your token by offering attractive rewards.
step3.description2: When setting up a staking event, you can configure:
step3.list1: Interest rate (APY) - The annual percentage yield for stakers
step3.list2: Staking duration - How long tokens need to be locked
step3.list3: Minimum staking amount - The minimum tokens required to participate
step3.list4: Maximum staking capacity - Total tokens that can be staked
step3.description3: Once configured, your staking event becomes active and visible to all users on the platform.

step4.title: 4. Users Participate in Staking
step4.description: Once a staking event is active, users can participate by staking their tokens in the dedicated staking project (which will be launched separately in the future). Users can browse available staking events, review the interest rates and terms, and stake their tokens to start earning rewards.
step4.description2: The staking project will provide a user-friendly interface where stakers can:
step4.list1: View all available staking events for approved tokens
step4.list2: See interest rates, duration, and other terms
step4.list3: Stake their tokens and track rewards
step4.list4: Unstake tokens when the lock period ends
step4.description3: This creates a win-win situation: token creators can incentivize holding and reduce circulating supply, while stakers earn passive income on their tokens.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Publish your token in WhiteCreator and set up staking events, or participate in existing staking opportunities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about DFS Chain, wallets, tokens, and more.
faq.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or browse by category
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

whatIsDfs.question: What is DFS Chain?
whatIsDfs.answer: DFS Chain is a Web2 simulation of Web3 blockchain technology. It provides all the familiar blockchain concepts like blocks, transactions, wallets, and tokens, but runs on traditional web infrastructure. This makes it accessible to everyone without the complexity of managing seed phrases or private keys.

howToStart.question: How do I get started with DFS Chain?
howToStart.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply visit metaface.dfsscan.com and sign up with your email address. Your wallet will be automatically created, and you'll receive a unique wallet address (starting with dfs_0x). From there, you can explore the ecosystem, acquire DFS tokens, and interact with various DApps.

isFree.question: Is DFS Chain free to use?
isFree.answer: Creating an account and wallet is completely free. However, transactions on the network require gas fees paid in DRC20_DFS tokens. These fees are minimal and help maintain the network's sustainability.

createWallet.question: How do I create a wallet?
createWallet.answer: Visit metaface.dfsscan.com and click "Get Started". Sign up with your email address, and your wallet will be automatically generated. Unlike traditional blockchain wallets, you don't need to manage seed phrases - your wallet is securely linked to your email account.

walletAddress.question: What does my wallet address look like?
walletAddress.answer: DFS Chain wallet addresses start with "dfs_0x" followed by a unique alphanumeric string. For example: dfs_0x1a2b3c4d5e6f7890... This format makes it easy to identify DFS Chain addresses.

multipleWallets.question: Can I have multiple wallets?
multipleWallets.answer: Currently, each user account is linked to one wallet address. This ensures a straightforward user experience and simplifies asset management. We may introduce multi-wallet support in future updates.

recoverWallet.question: How do I recover my wallet if I lose access?
recoverWallet.answer: Since your wallet is linked to your email address, you can recover access by using the password recovery option on Metaface. As long as you have access to your email, you can regain access to your wallet.

whatIsDrc20.question: What is DRC20?
whatIsDrc20.answer: DRC20 is the token standard for DFS Chain, similar to ERC20 on Ethereum. It defines how tokens are created, transferred, and managed on our network. DRC20 token addresses start with "drc20_0x".

createToken.question: How do I create my own token?
createToken.answer: You can create your own DRC20 token using the Whitecreator platform at drc20.dfsscan.com. Simply fill in your token details (name, symbol, total supply, etc.), pay the creation fee, and submit for approval. Once approved, your token can be used across the network.

whatIsDfsCoin.question: What is DRC20_DFS?
whatIsDfsCoin.answer: DRC20_DFS is the native token of DFS Chain. It's used to pay gas fees for all transactions on the network. Think of it like ETH on Ethereum - you need it to perform any operation on the chain.

getDfsTokens.question: How do I get DFS tokens?
getDfsTokens.answer: You can acquire DFS tokens through several methods: trading on WEXSWAP (our DEX), participating in community events and airdrops, earning through ecosystem activities on platforms like POIPI, or purchasing from other users on HeyOTC.

transactionTime.question: How long do transactions take?
transactionTime.answer: Transactions are typically processed within 5 minutes, which is our block generation interval. Once included in a block, transactions are considered final and cannot be reversed.

gasFees.question: What are gas fees?
gasFees.answer: Gas fees are small payments made in DRC20_DFS tokens to process your transactions. They serve to prevent spam, allocate network resources fairly, and sustain the ecosystem. Fee amounts vary based on the complexity of the operation.

cancelTransaction.question: Can I cancel or reverse a transaction?
cancelTransaction.answer: Once a transaction is confirmed and included in a block, it cannot be cancelled or reversed. This is by design to maintain the integrity of the ledger. Always double-check transaction details before confirming.

transactionHistory.question: Where can I view my transaction history?
transactionHistory.answer: You can view all your transactions on DFSScan (dfsscan.com), our block explorer. Simply search for your wallet address to see your complete transaction history, including timestamps, amounts, and transaction hashes.

blockGeneration.question: How often are blocks generated?
blockGeneration.answer: New blocks are generated every 5 minutes on DFS Chain. Each block can contain thousands of transactions, ensuring high throughput while maintaining orderly processing.

isDecentralized.question: Is DFS Chain decentralized?
isDecentralized.answer: DFS Chain is a Web2 simulation of blockchain technology, meaning it runs on centralized infrastructure while providing blockchain-like functionality. This approach allows for easier onboarding and maintenance while still offering transparency and tokenization benefits.

builDApps.question: Can I build applications on DFS Chain?
builDApps.answer: Yes! DFS Chain has a growing ecosystem of DApps. You can integrate with our APIs to build wallets, exchanges, social platforms, and more. Check out our documentation or contact us to learn about building on DFS Chain.

dataHandling.question: What happens to my data?
dataHandling.answer: Transaction data is stored permanently on DFS Chain and is publicly viewable on our block explorer. Personal information (like your email) is kept private and secure. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for complete details on data handling.

about.title: Building the Bridge Between
about.subtitle: DFS Chain is on a mission to make blockchain technology accessible to everyone.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: DFS Chain was born from a simple observation: blockchain technology, despite its revolutionary potential, remained inaccessible to the majority of internet users. Complex wallet setups, confusing seed phrases, and technical jargon created barriers that kept many from experiencing the benefits of Web3.
ourStory.p2: We asked ourselves: "What if we could provide all the benefits of blockchain—transparency, tokenization, and immutable records—without the complexity?" This question led to the creation of DFS Chain, a Web2 simulation that brings blockchain concepts to life using familiar, accessible technology.
ourStory.p3: Today, DFS Chain powers a growing ecosystem of applications, from wallets and explorers to social platforms and DEXs. We're proud to serve thousands of users who are experiencing blockchain-like functionality for the first time.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.subtitle: Where we're headed
ourVision.quote: To create a world where blockchain technology is as easy to use as email, where everyone can participate in the token economy, and where the benefits of decentralization are accessible to all.
ourVision.p1: We envision a future where DFS Chain serves as the gateway for millions of users to experience blockchain technology. A future where creators can tokenize their work, businesses can accept crypto payments seamlessly, and communities can govern themselves transparently.
ourVision.p2: Our roadmap includes advanced features like staking, governance, cross-chain bridges, and enterprise solutions. But our core mission remains the same: making blockchain accessible to everyone.

cookies.title: Cookie
cookies.note: By using DFS Chain, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. You can manage your preferences at any time through your browser settings.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content:
Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

Cookies allow websites to recognize your device and remember certain information about your visit, such as your preferences and settings.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content:
DFS Chain uses cookies and similar technologies for several purposes:

**Essential Cookies**
These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly.

**Performance Cookies**
These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

**Functionality Cookies**
These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make.

**Analytics Cookies**
We use analytics cookies to understand how you use our services.

typesOfCookies.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.content:
**Session Cookies**
Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser.

**Persistent Cookies**
Cookies that remain on your device for a set period.

**First-Party Cookies**
Cookies set by DFS Chain directly.

**Third-Party Cookies**
Cookies set by third-party services we use.

specificCookies.title: 4. Specific Cookies We Use
specificCookies.content:
• **theme_preference** - Stores your light/dark mode preference
• **session_id** - Maintains your login session
• **analytics_id** - Used for anonymous usage analytics
• **consent_status** - Remembers your cookie consent choice
• **language** - Stores your language preference

managingCookies.title: 5. Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our website settings.

cookieRetention.title: 6. Cookie Retention
cookieRetention.content:
• **Session cookies**: Deleted when you close your browser
• **Preference cookies**: Retained for 1 year
• **Analytics cookies**: Retained for up to 2 years
• **Essential cookies**: Retained for the duration of your session

updates.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.content:
If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:

**Email:** privacy@dfsscan.com
**Website:** https://dfsscan.com/contact

twitter.description: Follow us for the latest news, updates, and announcements.

telegram.description: Join our active community chat for discussions and support.

discord.description: Connect with developers, get support, and participate in events.

github.description: Explore our open-source repositories and contribute to development.

youtube.description: Watch tutorials, demos, and community highlights.

medium.description: Read in-depth articles, guides, and technical deep-dives.

reddit.description: Join discussions, share ideas, and stay updated with the community.

linkedin.description: Connect professionally and explore career opportunities.

stats.title: Our Growing Community

newsletter.title: Stay Updated

hero.title: Build the Future of
hero.subtitle: Join a passionate team making blockchain technology accessible to everyone. We're always looking for talented individuals who share our vision.

whyJoin.title: Why Join DFS Chain?
whyJoin.subtitle: We offer more than just a job - we offer the chance to shape the future of technology.

remoteFirst.title: Remote First
remoteFirst.description: Work from anywhere in the world

learningBudget.title: Learning Budget
learningBudget.description: Annual budget for courses and conferences

values.title: What We Believe
values.belief1: We believe blockchain should be accessible to everyone
values.belief2: We value transparency in everything we do
values.belief3: We move fast but maintain quality
values.belief5: We celebrate diversity of thought and background

moderator.title: Moderator
moderator.description: Help maintain a positive and engaging community environment. Moderate discussions, answer questions, and ensure our community guidelines are followed.

hiring.title: Our Hiring Process
hiring.subtitle: Simple, transparent, and respectful of your time

cta.title: Don't See the Right Role?
cta.subtitle: We're always looking for talented individuals. Send us your resume and tell us how you'd like to contribute.
